spec_data.Name: ghc-rpm-macros
spec_data.Description:
A set of macros for building GHC packages following the Haskell Guidelines
of the Fedora Haskell SIG.  ghc needs to be installed in order to make use of
these macros.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 19 Oct 2017 08:29:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: RPM macros for building Haskell packages for GHC
